markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Risen Fetch](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2209)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Echoes of the corrupted soul of the [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) can be used to spawn a fetch as well. A risen fetch appears more as its source did in life than as an undead.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 49

**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 49

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 47

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 22">[Risen Fetch](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2209)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 613</row>

**Perception** +38; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +38, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +40, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +42, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +42, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +38, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +42, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +38, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +36

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +6

**Con** +10

**Int** +8

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +10
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 48 

**Fort** +38 

**Ref** +34 

**Will** +34 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)
</row>

**HP** 470

, regeneration 50 (deactivated by [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) or negative)

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=272)20, negative 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fetch weapon +41 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile B](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 4d8+18 slashing plus 4d6 mental

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 45, attack +37
- **Cantrips (10th)**
[Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **3rd**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) (at will)
- **7th**
[Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=93), [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (to or from the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10) only)
- **8th**
[Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=93), [Spirit Song](/Spells.aspx?ID=303), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)
- **9th**
[Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=93), [Overwhelming Presence](/Spells.aspx?ID=212), [Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=336), [Weird](/Spells.aspx?ID=375)
- **10th**
[Alter Reality](/Spells.aspx?ID=8)
- **Constant (9th)**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Duplicate Victim** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Trigger** The risen fetch critically hits a [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) target with a fetch weapon Strike and has a [_duplicate foe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=93) spell available; **Effect** The risen fetch casts _duplicate foe_ on the target, who takes a –4 status penalty on the saving throw to resist.

**Manifest Fetch Weapon** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Trigger** The fetch starts its turn; **Effect** A fetch weapon manifests in the fetch's hand. As soon as a fetch weapon is no longer wielded by a fetch, it vanishes. The fetch chooses the type of weapon it manifests, but it does not gain any of that weapon's standard weapon traits, instead using the traits listed above in the fetch weapon Strike.

**Steady Spellcasting**   If a reaction would disrupt the risen fetch's spellcasting action, the risen fetch attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-322" />
name: Risen Fetch

text: Risen Fetch Echoes of the corrupted soul of the undead can be used to spawn a fetch as well. A risen fetch appears more as its source did in life than as an undead. Manifest Fetch Weapon Free Action (Conjuration, Primal) Trigger The fetch starts its turn; Effect A fetch weapon manifests in the fetch's hand. As soon as a fetch weapon is no longer wielded by a fetch, it vanishes. The fetch chooses the type of weapon it manifests, but it does not gain any of that weapon's standard weapon traits, instead using the traits listed above in the fetch weapon Strike. Steady Spellcasting If a reaction would disrupt the risen fetch's spellcasting action, the risen fetch attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.
